definition: not more than so-so (idiom); mediocre/nothing out of the ordinary
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: However you praise the film, I just feel it so-so.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么夸耀那部影片，可我觉得它不过尔尔。

sentences.english: Superficially, one might think the answer is "not much.
sentences.chinese: 表面上看，有人可能觉得这答案“不过尔尔”。

sentences.english: But the incident did not affect me any more deeply than that.
sentences.chinese: 但是这件事对我的影响不过尔尔。

definition: looks impressive but is worthless (idiom)/not as good as it looks/a reputation with no substance
insignificant talent/skill of no high order/minor accomplishment
with an undeserved reputation (idiom); unwarranted fame/nowhere near as good as he's made out to be
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
lit. not a common chord (idiom); outstanding/brilliant/out of the common run
the name does not reflect the reality (idiom); more in name than in fact/Reality does not live up to the name./Excellent theory, but the practice does not bear it out.
the name does not correspond to reality (idiom); it doesn't live up to its reputation
